question.questionA: Fruit fleshy, not enclosed in calyx; flowers conspicuous, pink, white or green.
question.questionB: Fruit dry, enclosed in calyx; flowers inconspicuous, yellowish or greenish.

question.questionA: Rigid,  erect  annuals;  leaves  linear-lanceolate, acute; flowers green,buried in the axils of the leaves.
question.questionB: Tomentose shrubs; leaves ovate or  scale-like;  flowers  yellow, emerging from the axils of the leaves.

question.questionA: Leaves fleshy, scale-like, closely adpressed to the stem.
question.questionB: Leaves not fleshy, ovate, not adpressed.
